overview: Jack Harris (John Strong) maniplates teen sitter Rosie (Arietta Adams) who appears to be having issues in her relationship with her boyfriend. He plays her in the head assuming ideas to help her, but that will eventually cause her relationship to break down. Taking the opportunity, Jack tells her that the reason the boyfriend left must be because she was boring in bed.  A priest, Father Thomas (Steve Holmes), takes advantage of the desperate bride to be, Anna (Gia Paige) in secret. She cheated on her future husband and asked for forgiveness to get married.
title: Corrupting Her Innocence
